rationale: The segment reports a housing requirement and the control area extent but does not contain an intensifier modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Agriculture Victoria has issued a housing requirement for all birds within the restricted and controlled areas around Meredith and Terang, which requires all poultry farmers, backyard chicken owners and those with pet birds to keep them enclosed in cages or sheds. The control area [around Meredith and Terang] stretches almost all the way to Ballarat and Geelong.
